motivation.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
motivation.author: Winston Churchill

motivation.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
motivation.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivation.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
motivation.author: Steve Jobs

motivation.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
motivation.author: Sam Levenson

motivation.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
motivation.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

technology.text: The computer was born to solve one problem, which is to compute faster.
technology.author: Bill Gates

technology.text: Technology is best when it brings people together.
technology.author: Matt Mullenweg

technology.text: The advance of technology is based on making it fit in so that you don't even notice it.
technology.author: Douglas Adams

technology.text: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
technology.author: Arthur C. Clarke

technology.text: The Web as I envisaged it, we have not seen it yet. The future is still so much bigger than the past.
technology.author: Tim Berners-Lee

technology.text: It's not that we use technology, we live technology.
technology.author: Godfrey Reggio

life.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
life.author: John Lennon

life.text: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
life.author: Dr. Seuss

life.text: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.text: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
life.author: Robert Frost

life.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
life.author: Confucius

life.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
life.author: Dalai Lama

wisdom.text: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
wisdom.author: Aristotle

wisdom.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.text: Wisdom is not a product of schooling but of the lifelong attempt to acquire it.
wisdom.author: Albert Einstein

wisdom.text: The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool.
wisdom.author: William Shakespeare

wisdom.text: Patience is the companion of wisdom.
wisdom.author: Saint Augustine

love.text: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
love.author: Aristotle

love.text: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
love.author: Audrey Hepburn

love.text: We are most alive when we're in love.
love.author: John Updike

love.text: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
love.author: Loretta Young

love.text: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
love.author: David Viscott

love.text: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
love.author: Victor Hugo

success.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
success.author: Albert Schweitzer

success.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
success.author: Henry David Thoreau

success.text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
success.author: Thomas Jefferson

success.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
success.author: Winston Churchill

success.text: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
success.author: John D. Rockefeller

success.text: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
success.author: Bo Bennett

inspiration.text: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
inspiration.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspiration.text: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
inspiration.author: Audrey Hepburn

inspiration.text: Do one thing every day that scares you.
inspiration.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

inspiration.text: It's during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
inspiration.author: Aristotle

inspiration.text: Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail.
inspiration.author: Charles Kettering

inspiration.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
inspiration.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
